titleStmt.title: A true coppy of His Majesties proclamation for England upon the occasion of the designed invasion.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)
James II, King of England, 1633-1701.

notesStmt.note: "Given at our court at Whitehall, the 28th day of September, 1688. In the fourth year of our reign."
Imperfect: creased, with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
